smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'MainViewModel' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ElasticDragDismissFrameLayout' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'MainCardItem' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'MainViewModelNEW' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'MainCardItem' with '25' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
File 'OtherExtensions.kt' with '15' functions detected. Defined threshold inside files is set to '11'
Class 'TextViewModel' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'TextFragment' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'SingletonComponent' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'VisualFragment' with '18' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ElasticDragDismissFrameLayout' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'SnapsLocalDataSource' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'SnapsDao' with '21' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Interface 'SnapsDataSource' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'SnapsRepository' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function dragScale appears to be too complex.
The function bindMutable appears to be too complex.
The function bind appears to be too complex.
The function bind appears to be too complex.
The function fsmSelectWithCorrectColor appears to be too complex.
The function generateDiffRows appears to be too complex.
The function generateInlineDiffs appears to be too complex.
The function dragScale appears to be too complex.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function pullOutTags is nested too deeply.
Function fsmSelectWithCorrectColor is nested too deeply.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onViewCreated is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onViewCreated is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class TextFragment is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class VisualFragment is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface SingletonComponent is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface SnapsDao is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface SnapsDataSource is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: EmptyCatchBlock
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: This empty block of code can be removed.
This empty block of code can be removed.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionThrown
smells.description: Thrown exception is too generic. Prefer throwing project specific exceptions to handle error cases.

instances.message: Exception is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.
Exception is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.
Exception is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'DividerItemDecoration.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'InsetDecoration'.
The file name 'Distinct.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'DistinctLiveData'.
The file name 'ViewExt.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'Size'.
The file name 'RxLifecycleExt.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'LifecycleAwareDisposable'.

smells.name: PackageNaming
smells.description: Package names should match the naming convention set in the configuration.

instances.message: Package name should match the pattern: ^[a-z]+(\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$
Package name should match the pattern: ^[a-z]+(\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: UnconditionalJumpStatementInLoop
smells.description: An unconditional jump statement in a loop is useless. The loop itself is only executed once.

instances.message: This loop contains an unconditional jump expression which essentially renders it useless as it will exit the loop during the first iteration.
This loop contains an unconditional jump expression which essentially renders it useless as it will exit the loop during the first iteration.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: WildcardImport
